General.Name: Northern Data AG
General.Description: Northern Data AG develops, builds, and operates high-performance computing (HPC) infrastructure solutions in Germany and internationally. It offers infrastructure for various HPC applications in the areas of cloud computing, cryptocurrency hosting services and hardware, and stationary and mobile data centers. The company was formerly known as Northern Bitcoin AG and changed its name to Northern Data AG in January 2020. Northern Data AG is headquartered in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
General.Address: An der Welle 3, Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 60322
